title: Palm hearts, avocado and egg salad
ingredients: ['4 ripe avocados, diced', '2 (400g) tins palm hearts, cut into 1 cm thick slices', '2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped', '4 spring onions, chopped', '1 red pepper, finely diced', '1 bunch of fresh coriander, chopped', 'For the dressing', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1/2 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon mustard', '1 tablespoon vinegar', 'salt and pepper to taste']
